mapper.sql: uid,ticket,created_at as createdAt,expired_at as expiredAt,actived_at as activedAt,password
mapper.select: select p.uid as uid,p.ticket as ticket,p.created_at as createdAt, p.expired_at as expiredAt from sys_passport p,sys_user u where p.uid=#{uid} and p.ticket=#{ticket} and p.expired_at > now() and p.uid=u.id and u.status <> #{status}
mapper.update: update sys_passport set expired_at = #{expiredAt} where uid=#{uid}
